name: ♡Happy pink pills♡ (Visual novel)
description:
Happy Pink Pills:

Many pills for a very big sadness. A larger girl crosses a long path of nostalgia and discouragement. There are different routes that give you different results, from a strange dream with the supermarket boy or a psychopath doctor. Play it now and know true happiness with Happy Pink Pills  :)
